text: Merrifield is a suburb in northern Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. Its local government area is the City of Hume. Hume Council signed off in May 2020 to create the new suburb, due to keep up with the high amount of development being undertaken in the area. Prior to the suburb's creation, the area was part of Mickleham. ==References== ==External links== Category:Suburbs of Melbourne Category:City of Hume
title: Merrifield, Victoria
